<a id="AudioEffectPhaser"></a>

# AudioEffectPhaser

**Inherits:** [AudioEffect](AudioEffect.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Adds a phaser audio effect to an audio bus.

Combines the original signal with a copy that is slightly out of phase with the original.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Combines phase-shifted signals with the original signal. The movement of the phase-shifted signals is controlled using a low-frequency oscillator.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Audio buses](../tutorials/audio/audio_buses.md)

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="AudioEffectPhaser_property_depth"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **depth** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#AudioEffectPhaser_property_depth)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_depth**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_depth**\ (\ )

Determines how high the filter frequencies sweep. Low value will primarily affect bass frequencies. High value can sweep high into the treble. Value can range from ``0.1`` to ``4.0``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AudioEffectPhaser_property_feedback"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **feedback** = `0.7` [ðŸ”—](#AudioEffectPhaser_property_feedback)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_feedback**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_feedback**\ (\ )

Output percent of modified sound. Value can range from 0.1 to 0.9.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AudioEffectPhaser_property_range_max_hz"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **range_max_hz** = `1600.0` [ðŸ”—](#AudioEffectPhaser_property_range_max_hz)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_range_max_hz**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_range_max_hz**\ (\ )

Determines the maximum frequency affected by the LFO modulations, in Hz. Value can range from 10 to 10000.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AudioEffectPhaser_property_range_min_hz"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **range_min_hz** = `440.0` [ðŸ”—](#AudioEffectPhaser_property_range_min_hz)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_range_min_hz**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_range_min_hz**\ (\ )

Determines the minimum frequency affected by the LFO modulations, in Hz. Value can range from 10 to 10000.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AudioEffectPhaser_property_rate_hz"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **rate_hz** = `0.5` [ðŸ”—](#AudioEffectPhaser_property_rate_hz)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_rate_hz**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_rate_hz**\ (\ )

Adjusts the rate in Hz at which the effect sweeps up and down across the frequency range.
